front.title: Requirements for Construction and Usage of Globally Routable User Agent (UA) URIs for the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: Several applications of the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) requirea user agent (UA) to construct and distribute a URI which can be usedby anyone on the Internet to route a call to that specific UAinstance. A URI which routes to a specific UA instance is called aGlobally Routable UA URI (GRUU). This document presents somemotivating use cases for GRUUs, and presents some requirements fortheir construction and usage.
